metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9317 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
The gdImageCreate function in the GD Graphics Library (aka libgd) before 2.2.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (system hang) via an oversized image.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9317` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.1.0-3ubuntu0.6
libgd3 - 2.1.0-3ubuntu0.6
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> php uses the system libgd2

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0-3ubuntu0.6').
